name: Apples
desc: An apple is an edible fruit produced by an apple tree.

name: Oranges
desc: Oranges are a type of low calorie, highly nutritious citrus fruit.

name: Watermelon
desc: Watermelon is a surprisingly healthy fruit

name: Pumpkin
desc: A pumpkin is a cultivar of winter squash that is round with smooth, slightly ribbed skin

name: Beans
desc: A bean is the seed of one of several genera of the flowering plant family Fabaceae

name: Potato
desc: The potato is a root vegetable native to the Americas, a starchy tuber of the plant Solanum tuberosum

name: Tomato
desc: The tomato is the edible berry of the plant Solanum lycopersicum

name: Radish
desc: The radish is an edible root vegetable of the family Brassicaceae that was domesticated in Asia

name: Cucumber
desc: Cucumber is a widely-cultivated creeping vine plant in the Cucurbitaceae gourd family that bears cucumiform fruits

name: Pineapple
desc: Cucumber is a widely-cultivated creeping vine plant in the Cucurbitaceae gourd family that bears cucumiform fruits

name: Grapes
desc: A grape is a fruit, botanically a berry, of the deciduous woody vines of the flowering plant genus Vitis.
